name: Sweet Potato Black Bean Chili
description: Full of flavor and so simple to make, this Sweet Potato Black Bean Chili is a wonderfully satisfying vegetarian meal! Best served with avocado chunks, cilantro and cornbread.
recipeIngredient: 1 large sweet potato, peeled and diced
28 ounces diced tomatoes, with their juices (OR fire roasted tomatoes)
(2) 15-ounce  cans black beans, drained and rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot over medium heat, add the olive oil. Saute the diced onion for 3-4 minutes, until translucent, then add in the garlic and sweet potato and cook about 2 more minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pot over medium heat, add the olive oil. Saute the diced onion for 3-4 minutes, until translucent, then add in the garlic and sweet potato and cook about 2 more minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Next add the chili powder, cumin, smoked paprika and salt. Stir into the vegetable mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Next add the chili powder, cumin, smoked paprika and salt. Stir into the vegetable mixture.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour in the diced tomatoes along with their juices, drained and rinsed black beans and the 2 cups of water. Stir to combine. Simmer the mixture, uncovered, for 20-25 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour in the diced tomatoes along with their juices, drained and rinsed black beans and the 2 cups of water. Stir to combine. Simmer the mixture, uncovered, for 20-25 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Use the back of a spoon to mash some of the sweet potatoes for a thicker texture, if desired.
recipeInstructions.name: Use the back of a spoon to mash some of the sweet potatoes for a thicker texture, if desired.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with avocado chunks, cilantro, chopped green onions, vegan cornbread or vegan sour cream.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with avocado chunks, cilantro, chopped green onions, vegan cornbread or vegan sour cream.

keywords: black bean chili, sweet potato black bean chili, vegan chili, vegetarian chili
